title: Build and test release binary
description: Build optimized release binary. Test on target platform. Update start.sh or remove in favor of direct binary execution. Verify feature parity with Python version.

title: Add error handling and edge cases
description: Handle network errors, API errors, rate limits, invalid responses gracefully. Add retry logic if appropriate. Provide helpful error messages.

title: Implement terminal UI with colored output
description: Create terminal rendering with colored user/assistant messages. User messages in green, assistant in blue. Handle terminal clearing and conversation re-display.

title: Set up Rust project structure with Cargo.toml and dependencies
description: Initialize Cargo project with required dependencies: async-openai or reqwest, tokio, crossterm/colored, termimad, dotenvy. Set up src/main.rs entry point and module structure.

title: Implement environment and config loading
description: Load OPENAI_API_KEY from .env file using dotenvy crate. Handle missing key gracefully with clear error message.

title: Implement main REPL loop and conversation history
description: Create the main interactive loop: prompt for input, maintain message history, send to API, stream response, re-display conversation. Handle exit commands (exit, :q).

title: Implement OpenAI API client with streaming support
description: Create async client to call OpenAI chat completions API. Handle Server-Sent Events (SSE) streaming for real-time response output. Use async-openai crate or raw reqwest with eventsource-stream.

title: Implement markdown rendering for terminal
description: Render markdown-formatted responses in the terminal using termimad or similar crate. Support code blocks, headers, lists, bold/italic text.
